<title>AVA Guides and Staff | AVA Rafting</title>
<meta name="description" content="Meet the guides that make this Colorado white water rafting company one of a kind. Our guides hail from across the country, but have one goal in mind: to give you the outdoor experience of a lifetime." />

yoast_head_json.title: AVA Guides and Staff | AVA Rafting
yoast_head_json.description: Meet the guides that make this Colorado white water rafting company one of a kind. Our guides hail from across the country, but have one goal in mind: to give you the outdoor experience of a lifetime.
